pages.text: To get started I reccomend you have a look for $(thing)create$() in your $(thing)advancements tab$(). This will show you how to start creating things.$(br2)want referencing and examples? click the goggles icon, from there you can acess the ponder index. $(br2)Alternatively:$(br)$(c:/create ponder)Click here to ponder
Stuck and not sure how this works? $(br2)The Create wiki has great information regarding the ins and outs of engineering.
